text: Blood Brothers () is a 1975 East German western film directed by Werner W. Wallroth and starring Dean Reed, Gojko Mitic and Gisela Freudenberg.Tóth p. 223 The film's sets were designed by the art directors Heinz Röske and Marlene Willmann. It was made by the state-controlled DEFA company. ==Cast== == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1975 films Category:East German films Category:German Western (genre) films Category:German historical films Category:1975 Western (genre) films Category:1970s historical films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Werner W. Wallroth Category:Films set in the 1860s Category:Red Western films
title: Blood Brothers (1975 film)
